charming old building- wonderul accouticts- seats not terribly comfortable- but the setting is worth it- feels as if performers are in your living room-
This is a small venue, perfect for concerts and easy to access. I saw both Randy Newman and Brian Wilson her and it was the ideal place to really appreciate their music.
